channel.title: CVE Feed for IDEC Corporation -- FC6A Series MICROSmart All-in-One CPU module
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IDEC Corporation -- FC6A Series MICROSmart All-in-One CPU module

item.title: CVE-2024-41927|2024-09-04T00:43:55.555Z -- idec%20corporation -- fc6a%20series%20microsmart%20all-in-one%20cpu%20module
item.description: Cleartext transmission of sensitive information vulnerability exists in multiple IDEC PLCs. If an attacker sends a specific command to PLC's serial communication port, user credentials may be obtained. As a result, the program of the PLC may be obtained, and the PLC may be manipulated.
